urls.title: Data on “high consequence” flood defence assets - a Freedom of Information request to Environment Agency
urls.description: 1. Please can you provide me with the data referenced in this article, https://unearthed.greenpeace.org/2021/01/24/floods-northern-england-storm-christoph/ , regarding the condition of the UK's flood defence assets? 2. Please can you provide the wording of the FOI request that Unearthed used to obtain this data. Yours faithfully, Katy Preen

@polkapolkaW13 @acabbie @MarcusxGrant @mariamartak @steve_ren @Photo_Iain @jenstridonkai @darrenmoore @WorldBollard @SpacePootler @SchJustina11 @ellielockx @P_DriscollW5W13 @MetCC @EnvAgency @XREaling @RBourchier @standardnews @ediz1975 Exactly.
